name: RFK Coin
description: What is the project about? Our coin is made to support Robert Kennedy Junior and his vision $RFKC is here to make political memecoins great again! RFKC is committed to seeing RFK Jr. become the next president of the United States and seeing his vision for freedom, justice, and unity brought to the world. Web3 movement bringing RFK to the world! Fueled by memetic political power, let $RFKC show you the way to a new Political memecoin narrative! What makes your project unique? The first POLITICAL MEMECOIN CHANGING THE WORLD History of your project. RFK is tired of political BS destroying America. He's here to save America and unify the world. He's exposing everything and everyone – big pharma, the industrial war complex, the CDC, FBI, NIH. With his sword of justice he's kicking ass and exposing the truths they don't want you to know! What’s next for your project? Supporting RFK Jr's Presidential Bid by Creating BASED memes, videos, and other content to support the Kennedy24 Campaign Advertisements to support RFK Jr. Creating the first Web3 SuperPAC dedicated to supporting RFK Jr. What can your token be used for? Many things - voting on proposals, treasury, participating in offline events and private dinners with RFK and many more
